name: LikeLoveHate
overview: React to media with Like, Love, or Hate
description: Adds Like, Love, and Hate reaction buttons to media item detail pages using Material Design icons.

versions.changelog:
Fixed item ID detection for Jellyfin 10.11+ (32-char hex IDs).
Reaction buttons now appear in header row and video player OSD.
Consistent button order (Love, Like, Hate) across all locations.
Configurable reaction colors in plugin settings.
